item.title: Kivy: Building GUI and Mobile apps with Python
item.description:
Summary

This talk will introduce the Kivy project (http://kivy.org). Kivyâ€™s mission is to make building graphical user interfaces on any device fun, efficient, and pythonic.

The talk will focus on giving attendees an overview of how they can use kivy to build exiting UIs and mobile apps.
item.dc:creator: Mathieu Virbel
